name: Zoom (itch)
description:
This is my first "complete" game ever made. 

Try it out and please please please provide feedback.

What should I add/change that would be good practice for a novice game developer.

I am using this as a learning opportunity.

I have been working on this on and off for about two months. It is not revolutionary in any of its game mechanics but I wanted to start simple so I could start making games. However, I have learned a lot in the process and overcome some challenges I hadn't even considered would come up.

I want to put it out there so people can play it and give feedback on what I can add/change that will improve my game development skills. I have always wanted to make games and GameMaker is making it a real possibility and I think this could be a great way for me to learn.

Feel free to be harsh. I know the game is simple, but it I was able to make it in several small sessions and I am happy to see something I made in motion.
